alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Okaloosa and Santa Rosa Counties through 300 PM CST... At 215 PM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Riverview to Roeville to near Oriole Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Mary Esther, Bagdad, Baker, Oriole Beach, Navarre, Pea Ridge, Roeville and Point Baker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
